name: fire opal earrings
description:
In the Middle Ages, opal was considered a stone that could provide great luck because it was believed to possess all the virtues of each gemstone whose color was represented in the color spectrum of the opal. My version of the opal will bring you lots of luck as there are flashes of all the colours of the rainbow in there. This is a bead that will change and flash and sparkle.  

Each bead is individually made by me! Each bead measures approximately 14mm x 14mm. They hang on sterling silver ear wires for a total length of approximately 40 mm.

My hands made these beads. I use Moretti (Effetre) glass, a little CIM and occasionally Vetrofond. All my beads are kiln annealed, thoroughly cleaned and inspected. There is no paint on any of my beads, just glass upon glass upon glass.

Please note that each fire opal earring is made one by one. There will be slight variations. All are lovely.

Please remember the jewelry looks larger than life in the pictures which is why it is important to check the size. I have tried to capture the colours as accurately as possible but many monitors vary.

This raspberry sparkle pendant is approximately 35 mm x 30 mm and hangs from a sterling silver snake chain… your choice of length. Please specify when ordering.

Each bead is individually made by me! There is no paint on any of my beads, just glass upon glass upon glass. Each bead is 4 - 8 layers of glass. This is what gives my beads the shimmering sparkle. This will light up a room and bring you oodles of compliments.

These are little sterling silver spacers that will slide onto a chain. They are designed as spacers. For those who collect my dots, the spacers will keep the dots from becoming large clusters. Although clusters are good too. 

If you'd like to wear 5, 7 or more dots on a chain and want them to lay in a line on the chain, simply slip a spacer in between each dot. 

The spacers come in 2 designs, a tube shape and a kidney shape. The tubes are 5 mm x 5 mm. The kidneys are 6 mm x 9 mm. 

Please note that the chains and the beads in the photos are for show only and are not included with the spacers. This item contains ONLY the tube or kidney spacers.

name: candy swirlypops necklace
description:
Swirlypops! Swirls and lollypops collided one day and became swirlypops! These can slip on and off the chain so that you can wear one, two or three! Round and round they go, swirls of colour to brighten up your day.

Candy swirlypops are bubble gum pink, periwinkle and fresh  lime. Each swirlypop is approximately 27mm. The three of them swing from a sterling silver ball chain, 16" or 18".

My hands made these beads. There is no paint on any of my beads, just glass upon glass upon glass. I use Moretti (Effetre) glass, a little CIM and occasionally Vetrofond. All my beads are kiln annealed, thoroughly cleaned and inspected.

Please remember the jewelry looks larger than life in the pictures which is why it is important to check the size. I have tried to capture the colours as accurately as possible but many monitors vary

Each bead is individually made by me! There is no paint on any of my beads, just glass upon glass upon glass. Each bead is 4 - 8 layers of glass. Around layer 3 I roll the bead in fine silver leaf, then encase it in more glass. When the bead is large I mash it flat so that the silver disperses. This is what gives my beads the shimmering transparency reminiscent of the ocean in sunshine.

name: shipping upgrade
description:
Sailorgirl Jewelry is shipped out free of charge by regular mail and Canada Post. Shipping takes approximately 3 - 5 business days within Ontario, 5 - 7 days within Canada and 5 - 10 days to the United States.

If you need your package to arrive quicker (you didn't leave this to the last minute did you?) you can purchase the Shipping Upgrade option. The shipping upgrade means that your purchase will be sent out by Canada Post Xpresspost - 2 days delivery within Ontario, 3 days within Canada.
